class CGOBRadioButton

Constructors and Destructors
CGOBRadioButtonSets default values.
Operations
GetGroupID Get group ID.
SetGroupID Set group ID.
SetState Set state of button.
SetText Set text to be displayed beside button.

Data Members
private
